About Me

I'm Software Engineer from Bihar, India, working in web development. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful and intuitive designs.

My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way. I created web design for many famous brand companies.

What I do!

Ui/Ux Design
Designs intuitive interfaces and enhances user experiences for digital applications.
Web Development
Skilled web developer proficient in front-end and back-end development, creating dynamic and user-friendly websites.
App Development
"Experienced app developer proficient in multiple platforms and skilled in UX/UI design."
